abstrac: We offers high quality, cost-effective data entry services.
bio:
Pleasure to introduce OmegaTech Solutions, a company engaged in rendering ITES to BPO and Sales and Marketing. We started our concern in early months of 2010 to provide a higher level and quality of services in BPO and Design and Multimedia industry. Our concern is administrated by Computer Professionals with long standing field experience spanning around 5 years in a private BPO Sector and 2 years in Design and Multimedia Sector.

A successful offshore business process outsourcing (BPO) provider with a Team of experienced professionals. Based at the south Indian city of Coimbatore, We deliver a wide range of BPO services to clients worldwide.

OmegaTech Solutions offers wide range of services to its clients touching all corners of IT enabled services. Our business processes provide a higher level and quality of services. 
The excellent 24x7 online customer support has endeared OmegaTech to its clients.

Payment methods : Via Guru or Paypal 

Communication : As per client required our professionals are
easily available in Guru, skype and other means of communication for quick
discussion. 

General Availability : We will available on 24/7
Day basis. 

Code of ethics / guarantee policy: Our policies are well designed to meet customer
needs such as Turnaround time, accuracy, confidentiality, and cost efficiency.
We believe that only happy customers can strengthen the company and make it
grow bigger.

abstrac: With IT, all things are possible!
bio:
I have a bachelor’s degree in Information Science and over fourteen years of experience working in various capacities under the umbrella of technology. I possess the ability to gather and translate end-user requirements into detailed specification documents, collaborate with technical developers to bring those requirements to fruition, and provide high-level and/or detailed updates to administration and stakeholders throughout the duration of the project.

I have been involved in all levels of software implementation, from conversion to cut-over and post-production support. As such, I understand and appreciate the role that complete and accurate documentation plays in the success of the project. I take pride in developing documentation that is professional, comprehensive, and that meets (and often exceeds) the needs and standards of the organization.

I love what I do, and believe that my enthusiasm shows through in every aspect of my work.

Standard Terms of Payment:

     20% Engagement Deposit
     30% Upon Scope of Work Approval
     50% Upon Completion and Delivery of Project

All payments must be made using Guru's SafePay or invoicing service.

If the project scope changes to an extent that substantially alters the terms described in any proposal, a revision to terms and/or a revised fee schedule must be agreed upon before further work proceeds.

Fees vary according to service and scope of work performed.  My fees range from $45 to $200 per hour; the amount listed under Services in my profile is the minimum amount that will be considered when bidding.

bio:
Architect and founder of RT Consult Architectural studio, located in Plovdiv, Bulgaria.

We are a team of architects with experience in both commercial and residential architecture. Over the course of the the past 10 years, we have completed multiple large scale project for Bulgarian and international clients.

For three years in a row our buildings have been recognized for their design and sustainability and have been in the Top 3 Building of the Year in Bulgaria.

We would be happy to discuss you needs and if necessary meet in person to make sure the project runs smoothly. For larger projects we have the resources to dedicate a team to your project.
Depending on project, could work on hourly basis or fixed project price.

abstrac: Linux and UNIX Systems Administrator with expertise in AWS Cloud, PERL, BASH and Python scripting and extensive knowledge of implementing enterprise solutions based on Open Source Software.
bio: As an experienced Linux and UNIX (BSD and Solaris) Systems administrator with expertise in AWS Cloud solutions and extensive knowledge of implementing enterprise solutions based on Open Source Technologies I have delivered value to companies (mainly ISPs) seeking to reduce the costs of delivering new services to their customers by leveraging open source software and the linux operating system. I have been instrumental in the conception, design, implementation and operation of highly available, performant systems based on linux and open source. My core skill-sets lie in the application of systems engineering methods and open source technologies to the development and implementation of service delivery platforms both in traditional IT environments and in public cloud environments.
Clear, written specifications please :-)

Thanks for reviewing my bid and thank you for choosing me to do the required job
Here i would like to inform you about my motivation as outsource employer


1-My First priority is to offer high quality job output that matches your requirement as you describe in your project.


2-In general I prefer a small milestone payment before starting work ,but the total deal I get it after you approved the project output


3-I like to get continous feed back from you,so in any project I will send to you daily and may be hourly work progress in original formats.for example if you want Auto CAD drawing I send to you the CAD file not image file to review it


4-If there is any problem faced me during working in your job,I will refund any money you pay to me completely.
